title: [Large-scale] Evidence-based Instructional Strategy Development for Online and Blended Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and understanding of fundamental secondary education concepts
context.additional_context: Strengthening online and blended learning design capabilities for current science education professionals in response to post-COVID educational environment changes

learning_goals: Learners can explain activity design methods that enhance flow experience in online learning environments
Learners can apply Theory of Planned Behavior (TPB)-based strategies to predict learner attitude changes when designing blended learning models
Learners can propose improvements to learning effectiveness using survey data in large-scale non-synchronous education
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
